Title: Relates to officer-involved deaths and near deaths
Summary: Creates a board to review officer-involved deaths and near deaths.
LawCode: Add §§842-a & 839-a, amd §216, Exec L; amd §700, County L; amd §190.25, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the county law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to officer-involved deaths and near deaths
